definition: fine parchment prepared from the skin of a young animal e.g. a calf or lamb
details:
noun
- fine parchment prepared from the skin of a young animal e.g. a calf or lamb
= example: fine parchment prepared from the skin of a young animal e.g. a calf or lamb
- a heavy creamy-colored paper resembling parchment
= example: a heavy creamy-colored paper resembling parchment
